basics.name: Sombir Singh
basics.label: Overall 8 Years of Work Experience in Full Stack Web Application Development
summary: Conscientious, results-driven, articulate and analytical software engineer with several years exposure in data-driven software engineering teams, primarily focusing on backend/frontend and systems development of large-scale distributed systems. Strong in architectural research, software design and agile team management, having served as a tech lead at multiple companies.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Interested in challenging technical roles in scaling distributed web applications.
Overall 8 years of work experience as Full Stack Web Application development

highlights: Involved in the development and maintenance of the client's products in the IOT & Wireless Systems for mobile devices
Managing vCPE devices through web application which provide feature of configuration & management option of vCPE devices.
Managing a vehicle device through web portal by which you can monitor your vehicle location, performence etc.

skills.title: Programming Languages & Database
description: Worked primarily with JavaScript, PHP and HTML, with frameworks such as Express.js, Node.js, React.js, AngularJS, Codigniter, CakePHP, Django, Drupal, Bootstrap, CSS3, LESS and SASS

PHP: PHP-4&5, CakePHP, Kohana, Codigniter, Drupal, WordPress

references.name: Praveen Agnihotri
references.reference: Sombir started working with Infinite IT Solutions at the same time I joined the team. He quickly picked up PHP despite not using it before, and is a reliable and conscientious developer. He confidently asks questions when specifications or plans are unclear, helping stimulate discussion when most crucial.

references.name: Sunil Kumar
references.reference: Sombir was one of our first hires at Adglobal 360 India Pvt. Ltd. and I'm glad we got him. He worked diligently and gave much of himself to the company. He's a sharp computer scientist with broad interests. He can be trusted with much responsibility and to adapt quickly.

references.name: Vinod Kumar
references.reference: Sombir is a great team leader. Not only focusing on company goals effectively, but also pay attention to the growth of all teammates and the team. He absolutely can act as PM role by his excellent communication skills.
